body_html: Now that variable-length RNNs have been merged, it would be helpful to have a cross-entropy loss that allows masking, along the lines of Alex's second approach. But it isn't a showstopper because we can already get the same result with log_softmax followed by advanced indexing.
body_text: Now that variable-length RNNs have been merged, it would be helpful to have a cross-entropy loss that allows masking, along the lines of Alex's second approach. But it isn't a showstopper because we can already get the same result with log_softmax followed by advanced indexing.
body: Now that variable-length RNNs have been merged, it would be helpful to have a cross-entropy loss that allows masking, along the lines of Alex's second approach. But it isn't a showstopper because we can already get the same result with log_softmax followed by advanced indexing.
